entry.tran: (人)四处劫掠的;(动物)四处攫食的
entry.def: If you talk about marauding groups of people or animals, you mean they are unpleasant and dangerous, because they wander around looking for opportunities to steal or kill.

example.ex: Marauding gangs of armed men have been looting food relief supplies.
example.tran: 持械抢劫团伙一直在四处抢劫救济食品。

example.ex: ...safe from danger, such as marauding wild animals.
example.tran: 远离了诸如觅食野兽之类的危险

means.word_mean: 1. characterized by plundering or pillaging or marauding;
